title: Tyrol (state)
summary: Tyrol (/tɪˈroʊl, taɪˈroʊl, ˈtaɪroʊl/;[2] German: Tirol [tiˈʁoːl] (listen); Italian: Tirolo) is a state (Land) in western Austria. It comprises the Austrian part of the historical Princely County of Tyrol. It is a constituent part of the present-day Euroregion Tyrol–South Tyrol–Trentino (together with South Tyrol and Trentino in Italy). The capital of Tyrol is Innsbruck.[3]
